ctx: Moderna toži Pfizer in Biontech zaradi patentnih kršitev pri razvoju protikovidnih cepiv
content:
Žal je že skoraj 100 let staro cepljenje proti tuberkolozi baje
mnogo bolj unčikovito in tudi trajnostno bolj zaščiti kot vsa nova
cepiva.Cena cepiva pa je baje okoli 1 dolar na dozo.
author: FIN-467473

ctx: Moderna toži Pfizer in Biontech zaradi patentnih kršitev pri razvoju protikovidnih cepiv
content:
[FIN-467473]
Žal je že skoraj 100 let staro cepljenje proti tuberkolozi baje
mnogo bolj unčikovito in tudi trajnostno bolj zaščiti kot vsa nova
cepiva.
Study: Tuberculosis Vaccine May Only Protect Children Under Age 5
... The almost 100-year-old vaccine is one of the most common
immunizations administered worldwide. ... BCG vaccination was 37%
effective in children younger than 5 years of age. The vaccine
could not conclusively protect adults or children older than 10
years of age, according to the study.

www.pharmacytimes.co...nder-age-5
author: aimon
